int kurud_init ( char *  config  ) 

Loads and configure all the modules. If an invalid configuration file is passed as argument, the default configuration file is used.

Parameters:
[in] config - the configuration file
Returns:
KURUD_OK if no errors occurred, KURUD_ERROR otherwise.

int load_link_module ( char *  library,
char *  config 
) [static]

Loads the link protocol shared library, which name is specified in the link_lib_name parameter. If any error occurs, we terminate the execution of the daemon.

Parameters:
[in] library - the path to the link module
[in] config - the path to the configuration file
Returns:
KURUD_OK if no error occurs, KURUD_ERROR otherwise.

int load_symbol ( void **  address,
void *  handle,
const char *  symbol 
) [static]

Try to load a symbol from a shared library using dlsym. If the symbol can't be loaded, the function returned KURUD_ERROR;

Parameters:
[out] address - the resulting address of the requested symbol
[in] handle - the descriptor of the shared library
[in] symbol - symbol to be loaded from the shared library.
Returns:
KURUD_OK if no error occurs, KURUD_ERROR otherwise.
